summary: Removes vanilla scars from your character and NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
**************
[b]Description[/b]
**************

This is an extremely simple mod that merely replaces Vanilla scar textures with 1x1 blank textures. This effectively makes in-game scars completely invisible! Also, it may VERY slightly improve game performance. :)

I have made three versions of this mod, Male & Female, Male Only, and Female Only. I figured someone out there might the modularity useful.

P.S. This affects both the player and all other NPCs.
P.P.S. This kills some immersion. Don't like it? Don't use it. Simple!


*********
[b]Version[/b]
*********

1.0 Yup, *probably* won't get better than this.


**************
[b]Installation[/b]
**************

!!!Warning!!!
If you have any mods that alter Vanilla scar textures, this mod WILL replace them.

*Unzip the file with 7zip or winRar. (if you don't have 7zip by now you should really go get it)

*Open the No Scars folder, pick the option you'd like to install, and copy the "Data" folder within.

*Paste the Data folder into your Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim folder.

*If your computer prompts you to overwrite any existing files, do so.

*Voila! No more scars on your NPC's faces!


*************************
[b]Recommended Mods[/b]
*************************

These mods are by no means necessary. They are simply mods I enjoy and think you will too!

*Inhabitants of Skyrim-NPC Overhaul by Rops1981
( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23755/? )

*Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi
( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/? )

*Apachii Sky Hair
( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/? )


*********
[b]Credits[/b]
*********

*Me (Xanins): I spent about 20 minutes making this. Yay me.
*Xenius: I used his mod, High Resolution Scars, to get the .dds files and folder structure necessary to make these changes!
*Rops1981: He gave me the inspiration to make this mod. His mod, Inhabitants of Skyrim-NPC Overhaul, made my NPCs too lovely to have scars.
*Bethesda
author: Xanins
